author: Alemas
title: Argh, I think I got this along with the other two Duplo sets!
review:
Another set that my parents bought the year before I was born? Oh well... This set has a train with openable cabin, a trailer, a pony, and a minifig. Not much else to say, but I really liked this set!

Pros
Train
Pony
Openable cabin

Cons
None!

Overall, a great set for little conducters! LOL!
